SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.network

Class PingPongManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.network.PingPongManager
public class PingPongManager extends Object
Class used by the game controller to manage connections and disconnections in the game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final GameController
    gameController
    Game Controller.
    private static final int
    maxMissedPings
    Number of missed pings to detect a disconnection.
    private final Map<String,Boolean>
    playersPing
    Map containing all player in the game and a corresponding boolean value, which tells if they sent the last ping or not.
    private final Map<String,VirtualView>
    playerVirtualViews
    Map containing all players in the game with their virtual view, if a disconnection occurs, I need to know their virtual view.

  • Method Details

    • addPingSender

      public void addPingSender(String nickname, VirtualView virtualView)
      Method used to add a ping sender to the PingPongManager.
      Parameters:
      nickname - ping sender's nickname
      virtualView - ping sender's virtual view

    • receivePing

      public void receivePing(String nickname)
      Method used to receive a ping from a player with a certain nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname

    • getVirtualView

      public VirtualView getVirtualView(String nickname)
      Getter method for the virtual view associated to the nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - player's nickname
      Returns:
      player's virtual view

    • notifyPlayerDisconnected

      public void notifyPlayerDisconnected(String nickname)
      Method used to notify the ping receiver that a player disconnected if he asked to do so (via Tui / GUI). It is necessary to set his playersPing to false.
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname

    • checkPing

      public void checkPing(String nickname)
      Method that runs for every player and periodically checks if the player sent a ping. After a certain number of pings not sent in a row, detects a disconnection.
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname

    • sendPong

      private void sendPong(String nickname, VirtualView virtualView)
      Method used to send a pong update to the player, in order to make it aware connection is stable.
      Parameters:
      nickname - client's nickname
      virtualView - client's virtualView
